top_comments.comment:
"Where have all the men gone?"
They went their own way and checked out of society. They aren't in the dating pools. They aren't part of the feminism ideology rat race. They are mostly staying to themselves now. I'm not going to work myself to the bone to help people who won't lift a finger to help themselves. I'm not going to protect someone who demonizes me for doing so at all. I'm going to look out for me and my son and the rest of the world can burn as far as I care and I'm not alone in that feeling. I'm not going to put in tons of hours in overtime to keep up with the Jones's. I can, and will stand on my own, and I'm not going to lift a finger to help profit a system, ideology, and society that wants me gone.

A man talking about his feelings doesn't make an attractive man a woman would want to shack up with, but instead would make them into more of a female that women would feel comfortable talking to and not someone they'd be attracted to. Women talk about their feelings while men do not
